name: The Exit Is Deep
description:
After falling through a hole, you find yourself in the underground... With no way to go back the way you came, you must venture through and wall-slide through the undergrounds and find an exit! Though, be aware - The exit is deep!

Keyboard Controls: Left and Right arrow keys OR W/D to move left/right, Space to jump, Left Shift to sprint, F to shoot bow, E to interact.

Controller Controls: Left joystick OR D-Pad to move left and right, South button to jump (X on PS, A on XBox), Left joystick [press] OR Left trigger to sprint, Right trigger to shoot bow, West button to interact (Square on PS, X on XBox).

Hold yourself against a wall to slide (which also regenerates your jumps)!

Hey all! This is our submission for LD48 and also is our first game jam, and as we are only 17 and 18 years old, we both are quite new to game dev'ing (hence the couple bugs...), though, we made all of our art/sounds/scripts/etc in the jam time frame! We can't wait to read everyone's feedback!

Cheers! - Gates / Burger
